actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that a portion of the cost of studies undertaken by the Corps of Engineers be paid by non-Federal interests.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, from initiating any water resource study under his jurisdiction until the appropriate non-Federal interests agree to pay 50 percent of the cost of such study.

titles.title: A bill to provide that a portion of the cost of studies undertaken by the Corps of Engineers be paid by non-Federal interests.
